page_content:
Hunter Macdonald Limited

Cloud Design and Transition

Commissioning services for your Public, Private, Community and Hybrid Cloud. Hunter Macdonald's experienced consultants will design the services and capabilities of your cloud platform so that it is capable of supporting your long term business or plan the transition of your virtualisation platform to a Private or Hybrid cloud.

Features

  • Cloud Platform Readiness, Design your Private, Public, Hybrid, Community Cloud
  • Design, Implement and Manage your IaaS, Paas, SaaS, DRaaS Services
  • Infrastructure Migration to IaaS, Cloud Migration, DaaS, BaaS, SaaS, TaaS
  • Virtualisation to Cloud, Private to Public, Public to Public
  • IaaS Migration, IaaS Replatforming, Infrastructure as a Service, IaaS Transformation
  • Service Integrator, Cloud Support, Cloud Maintenance, System Integration, Compute Support
  • Core infrastructure update, Cloud Provider, Support Provider, Technical Authority, CSA
  • Cloud Transformation, Azure, Amazon AWS, Google, IBM, Private, Public, Hybrid
  • VMWare vSphere, ESXi, SCVMM, System Center, vsphere Cloud, vCloud
  • VPC, Hyper-V, Microsoft, Automation, Orchestration, Operations, Metered, Unit, Cost

Benefits

  • Focus on cloud based services to achieve cost savings
  • Achieving business outcomes using cloud technology as an enabler
  • Fixed price or SFIA, to best suit your business requirements
  • Outcome and deliverable based – ensuring business benefits are achieved
  • Identify cost reductions / savings (redundant applications or services)
  • Achieving the required deliverables and outcomes for the client
  • Driving delivery and service excellence using the cloud
  • Proven methodology from experienced cloud technology team adoption
  • Integrated Infrastructure (IaaS) and Application (SaaS / PaaS) services
  • SC cleared resources, Security Cleared resources

Pricing

£522 per person per day

  • Including VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Day
